Suggestion for a mod : Telemetry++ : what does it do? it adds the ability to do the same experiment type multiple times.

Isn't that OP? No, There is a cooldown between missions for the science points to recharge.

What about crew reports? crew reports exactly the same as experiments,however....

INTRODUCING THE NEW CREW TELEMETRY SYSTEM! basically for every crewman/woman/kerbal on a vessel it produces 0.5 science points and it regenerates every 2 hours. this makes lifesupport more valuable and stations make more sense.

example launch a mystery goo container into orbit later (after about a week) placing another mystery goo sat in orbit and get the same science as the previous one, Kinda like weather satalittes or lunar ASLEP experiments

Edited September 23, 2015 by Noah_Blade
